about_the_game: Become a hero in a land ravaged by rats. This game is a turn-based RPG, where you have the freedom to explore the maps and find different enemies to fight, find allies and ask them to join your campaign, assemble your team with the best armor and weapons possible, defeat all the corruption that harms your people and in the end destroys the dragon of greed, good luck on your journey.
detailed_description: Become a hero in a land ravaged by rats. This game is a turn-based RPG, where you have the freedom to explore the maps and find different enemies to fight, find allies and ask them to join your campaign, assemble your team with the best armor and weapons possible, defeat all the corruption that harms your people and in the end destroys the dragon of greed, good luck on your journey.
legal_notice: Unreal Engine 4.27 for game develompent, Blender 3.1 for assets edition and creation, Ready Player Me web site for some characters initial base creation.
